laboratory_examinations.findings: 0 μg per milliliter (homozygous patient); 14.1 μg per milliliter (heterozygous patients); 27.5 μg per milliliter (normal genotype patients).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Heterozygous patients exhibited approximately 50% of ficolin-3 serum levels compared to wild-type FCN3 patients.

laboratory_examinations.findings: IgM level was 0.24 g per liter (reference range: 0.29 to 2.0), normal levels for IgG, IgG subclasses, and IgA.
Normal activity of classical, MBL, and alternative complement pathways.
Leukocytes: 4.8 x 10^6/ml; Neutrophils: 4.8 x 10^6/ml; Lymphocytes: 3.9 x 10^6/ml.
Progressively decreased lung capacity and obstructive lung disease.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased lung capacity observed over time despite treatment.
